title: What Do the Icons Mean on Snapchat: Received, Viewed, Sent, and More

steps.title: Received means you have an unopened Snap or Chat.
steps.content: Received means you have an unopened Snap or Chat. If you’re just getting started on Snapchat (maybe you’ve just created your account ), it can take a little while to learn all of the message icons. There are three icons that differentiate between the types of received messages: [1] X Research source Red square — unopened Snap without audio Purple square — unopened Snap with audio Blue square — unread Chat

steps.title: Viewed indicates that you have opened a Snap or Chat.
steps.content: Viewed indicates that you have opened a Snap or Chat. There are four variants of the viewed icon. Red unfilled square — you viewed a Snap without audio Purple unfilled square — you viewed a Snap with audio Blue unfilled square — you viewed a Chat Gray unfilled square — a Snap or Chat possibly expired after pending

steps.title: Sent is when you have sent a Snap or Chat, but it hasn’t been viewed.
steps.content: Sent is when you have sent a Snap or Chat, but it hasn’t been viewed. There are four icons that represent when you’ve sent a picture , video, or chat: Red arrow — your sent Snap without audio hasn’t been viewed Purple arrow — your sent Snap with audio hasn’t been viewed Blue arrow — your sent Chat hasn’t been viewed Gray arrow — the user you sent a Snap or Chat to is not your friend

steps.title: Opened means your friend has viewed the Snap or Chat you sent.
steps.content: Opened means your friend has viewed the Snap or Chat you sent. There are three opened icons: Red unfilled arrow — your sent Snap without audio has been viewed Purple unfilled arrow — your sent Snap with audio has been viewed Blue unfilled arrow — your sent Chat has been viewed

steps.title: Screenshot means someone has taken a screenshot of your Snap or Chat.
steps.content: Screenshot means someone has taken a screenshot of your Snap or Chat. There are three screenshot icons: Red unfilled arrow on top of a left-facing arrow — the person you sent a Snap without audio took a screenshot of it Purple unfilled arrow on top of a left-facing arrow — the person you sent a Snap with audio took a screenshot of it Blue unfilled arrow on top of a left-facing arrow — the person you sent a Chat took a screenshot of it

steps.title: Replay means the user has replayed your Snap.
steps.content: Replay means the user has replayed your Snap. There are two types of replays: Red arrow going in a circle — the user replayed your Snap without audio Purple arrow going in a circle — the user replayed your Snap with audio
